title: Context7 API Documentation
body_html:
Context7 API Documentation

Overview

Context7 is an MCP server that provides up-to-date code documentation and examples directly to Large Language Models (LLMs). It offers a RESTful API that can be queried independently to fetch fresh code snippets and documentation. just making a small change to trigger the webhook

Key Features

  • RESTful API with endpoints for querying documentation relevant to code context.
  • Supports token-based authentication.
  • Designed for integration with LLMs but usable as a standalone API.
  • Open source under the MIT license.

Usage

  • Query the API with relevant code cursor or prompt context to receive up-to-date documentation and code examples.
  • The API enhances AI agent grounding by providing fresh and relevant programming information.

Resources

  • Official website: https://context7.com
  • GitHub repository: https://github.com/upstash/context7
  • Blog: https://upstash.com/blog/context7-mcp

Further detailed endpoint descriptions and usage examples can be added as needed.
